pageContext.claim: “So funny to watch Schumer groveling. He called for the firing of bad cop James Comey many times - UNTIL I FIRED HIM!”
pageContext.analysis: Democrats such as Rep. Nancy Pelosi and Sen. Charles Schumer certainly had soured on FBI Director James Comey because of his handling of the Hillary Clinton email controversy, especially his decision to reopen the investigation ten days before the election. Schumer had said he lost confidence in Comey and Pelosi said "maybe he's not in the right job." He did not call for his firing. But the circumstances of Comey's firing appeared suspicious and unrelated to the Clinton matter. Democrats especially expressed concern over the effect Comey’s firing could have on an investigation into Russia’s interference in the election that he oversaw
